summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 12 Classic Color Elegant Blush Set
Review Date: 2015/12/05
Store: EMORI
Product Description: ['Classic 12 color blush kit, comes in 2 blush set. Each set is around 5 inch in length and 4 inch in width. This blush set is all you need to bring out the best look. Perfect for everyday use.']
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'EMORI', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Unit Count': '1 count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.88 x 4.09 x 1.1 inches; 3.99 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is good quality makeup... My only dislike of the palettes is that there are more orange and peach like colors.. If you like them... Then this would be a good palette for you.. I really like more pinky colors but it is a good  palette.
Review Title: Good peachy colors
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: NEW 2015 KISS imPRESS "BIG FLIRT" Short Length by Broadway Press-On Manicure Nails
Review Date: 2016/03/14
Store: imPRESS
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Brand': 'ImPRESS', 'Style': 'French', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 1.85 x 0.94 inches; 0.67 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Kiss'}
Review Text: And they look great
Review Title: Fun to use
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Makeup Geek Eyeshadow Pan - Peach Smoothie
Review Date: 2016/04/16
Store: Makeup Geek
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Makeup Geek', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Skin Type': 'All'}
Review Text: This is a truly all over good color... Definitely recommend.  I love their foiled shadows. If you havnt tried them you must.
Review Title: Love love love makeup geeks shadows escpecially the foiled ones
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Josie Maran Argan Enlightenment Illuminizer - Hydrate and Smooth Skin with this Creamy Highlighting Concentrate (15ml/0.5oz)
Review Date: 2017/05/27
Store: Josie Maran
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Coverage': 'Light, Full', 'Brand': 'Josie Maran', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 1.25 x 1.25 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '755332565863 787734629850 737003482242 879634008467'}
Review Text: This is good to add to your foundation to darken it or to lighten your skin. It also is cey moisturizing ..
Review Title: Like adding to foundation
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lookatool Pro Makeup Cosmetic Brushes Powder Foundation Eyeshadow Contour Brush Tool
Review Date: 2017/09/04
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {}
Review Text: Great for highlighting
Review Title: Love these
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: VERA MONA Color Switch®
Review Date: 2018/05/21
Store: VERA MONA
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Color': 'Purple', 'Brand': 'VERA MONA', 'Item Form': 'foam', 'Product Benefits': 'Removes pigment instantly from any brush', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 1 x 3 inches; 1.5 Ounces', 'Item model number': '863151000011', 'UPC': '863151000011 784179713892 755332626700', 'Manufacturer': 'Vera Mona', 'Country of Origin': 'China'}
Review Text: And is extremely handy
Review Title: This works
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Boo-Boo Cover-Up Healing Concealer, Medium, 0.13 Ounce
Review Date: 2018/09/24
Store: Boo-Boo Cover-Up
Product Description: ['Have a Boo-Boo on the Go? Skip the bandage and the shiny ointment. Look your best even while you heal with Baby Boo-Boo Cover-Up for the Face and Body. Our innovative formula offers great coverage for skin imperfections while containing ingredients known in nature to promote healing. Contains aloe, chamomile, green tea, tea tree oil and vitamin E Net Weight 0.13 oz / 4 mL']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Color': 'Medium', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Brand': 'Boo-Boo Cover-Up', 'Coverage': 'Medium', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.5 x 2 x 1 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '723175846012'}
Review Text: i love the creaminess  of this product  i had originally got it as a highlighter it was a little bit too light for my skin so i ordered the medium which i have used before. i think i got it some time ago in an tipsy bag and wanted to get one again ever since just got my new one in the mail today, it works great for the undereye  area if you get tired from working so hard. my best and hope you enjoy. get the light if you are truly fair
Review Title: this shade was a little too light for me but great coverage
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AILIBOTE Samsung Galaxy S10e Screen Protector, [3 Pack] 9H Hardness Anti-Scratch Full Coverage Tempered Glass Screen Protector Film for Samsung73
Review Date: 2019/03/01
Store: Ben Nye
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ben Nye', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Coverage': 'Full', 'Item Weight': '0.2 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.7 x 2.6 x 1.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '665760873785'}
Review Text: I have pink undertones in my skin as opposed to yellow so this balances out my makeup . If it’s too light it darkens it . If it’s too dark it lightens it . I would like it if it wasn’t so dry or maybe if they would add some dimethacone to it to make it more moist . My skin is dry and I always have to set the makeup with a spray to moisten it back after the foundation and powder is on ..  love it and it’s inexpensive
Review Title: My favorite color . Been using it for a long time
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details
    - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The purchase history reveals a strong preference for makeup and beauty products, particularly those that enhance appearance and offer versatile uses, such as versatile blush sets and highlighters. The individual tends to favor products with moderate to high ratings (generally 4.0+), showcasing a desire for quality. The sentiment towards products is mixed but leans positively, especially for items with unique features, like multifunctional concealers and beneficial ingredients.

Common themes include a focus on makeup aimed at achieving a polished look, with an emphasis on complexion products. The individual appreciates products that offer convenience and innovative formulations, such as a quick-change brush cleaner. There is a noticeable inclination towards hydrating and skin-friendly makeup solutions, indicating a quality preference for skincare-infused cosmetics.

Price sensitivity appears moderate; they prioritize value, as evidenced by consistent mentions of affordability alongside positive experiences. Yet, the consistent pursuit for quality suggests they would invest in products that meet their high standards.

Overall, the core preferences center around versatile, skin-friendly makeup products that enhance natural beauty while being efficient and enjoyable to use. The blend of quality-conscious choices and the willingness to experiment with varied cosmetic forms indicates a balanced approach to personal care and aesthetics.

target_interaction.title: blends easily stays on long and makes a nice lipstick too
target_interaction.text: I Really have liked this as a contour . Unfortunately I got the first time I used it way back when as a sample in a bag and I thought it was a lipstick and I loved the color and then saw its contour and used it as contour for under the chin and for the cheek hollows or to carve out your cheeks . It blends and stays all day and many other reviews adds it makes a great lipstick too.
target_interaction.title_meta: ModelCo Contour Stick | Medium-Dark Matte Bronze
